page.title: 20Law and Order, Rugby
page.content: {Dunchurch}has no Police Station.The village Policeman,based in Rugby,with a volunteer Special,patrols Dunchurch village.A 'neighbourhood watch 'has been introduced.The general public keep watch and report anything at all suspicious to the Police.Panic Buttons have been installed in old people's homes so that they can call for help easily.The buttons are radio linked to the policeman's van.There is not much serious crime in Dunchurch these days and the arrest rate is good.The village policeman keeps watch for any crimes,controlls the traffic and often gives talks to schools and other institutes and organisations.The police are on duty 24 hours a day and they work on a duty rota system.
